headline: Is Kimberly-Clark (KMB) Pricing Look Out Of Step With Recent Share Performance?
summary: If you are wondering whether Kimberly-Clark at around US$99 is a fair deal or a value trap, this article walks you through what the current share price really reflects. The stock has been relatively muted lately, with a 0.6% return over the last 7 days, a 1.3% decline over 30 days, and year to date and 1 year returns of 2.1% and 18.3% declines respectively, while the 3 and 5 year returns show 17.4% and 13.0% declines. Recent coverage has focused on Kimberly-Clark as a long established...
